html:
I wrote a 2D game, entirely in type-level Typescript.

Yes, you read that right. This is flappy bird, written only in Typescript types.

How did I do it? It involves a lot of type magic, and a new type-level Typescript runtime I made in Rust + Zig.

Let me walk you through it: pic.twitter.com/d9nioc0tmJ

— zack (in SF) (@zack_overflow) October 19, 2023

This is cool.
TS-Pattern is faster than most people think, and it's unlikely for code branching to be the perf bottleneck of your app, but compiling its runtime away is an interesting idea for perf critical code. Thank you for exploring this path @aidenybai & @zack_overflow! https://t.co/tE2siiUB9K

— Gabriel Vergnaud (@GabrielVergnaud) October 1, 2023
